name: We-already-did-all-the-work-for-your-lazy-ass
body:
We already did all the work for your lazy ass
=============================================

YES, that's right. Your personal army of open-source developers already hacked together your scaling cloud-based graph database with binary templating engine for CSS and REST/SOAP API on BASIC language! Go grab it & make some money already!

#Get Real

If you need something really strange and not useful to anyone, build it from scratch. But you still can use some [open-source components] (https://github.com/search?q=graph+database&p=1&ref=searchbar&type=Repositories&l=)
tagline: YES, that's right. Your personal army of open-source developers already hacked together your scaling cloud-based graph database with binary templating engine for CSS and REST/SOAP API on BASIC language! Go grab it & make some money already!
